testcase.classname: Test adding and editing employee fuctionality in User management
testcase.name: Verify Editing added employee functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "PIM" in sidepanel............................................passed Then PIM page is displayed..................................................passed When Admin clicks on edit for the employee with first and middle name "Linda Jane".passed Then "Personal Details" page is displayed...................................passed And update Test1235, hey and heyi...........................................passed And Admin clicks on save button.............................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And Click on "Job"..........................................................passed And Job details page is displayed...........................................passed Then Update Content SpecialistandAdministration.............................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed And Click on Employee list..................................................passed And Check if the employee with Test1235 hey,heyi and Content Specialist is updated.passed
